channel.title: Left 4 Dead mod coming 2010
channel.description:
Hi. I found an upcoming left 4 dead mod a while ago and I started helping the creators out by posting my ideas and such and I thought I should share the mod with you people. Here's the link: [url]https://left4dead11ty.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page[/url]
As far as I know there's no moddb page and such but this will serve enough. It's a standalone mod meaning you can get it without having Left 4 Dead.
Well,look around in the site and such and post your opinions about the mod down below and I'll read them.

item.title: Left 4 Dead mod coming 2010
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Chaoswolf75:

Also, rather than whining about the quality of the wikia, why dont you try and help out?

Because I’m working on my own that I haven’t announced for a few months and am now working on a site that is accessible and easy to use for the average person. :retard:

Read full topic

Are you familiar with the term “lost cause”? Besides, apparently its being released on that date no matter what, so what good would helping out do?

item.title: Left 4 Dead mod coming 2010
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
So… a dozen people have taken the Source engine, recoded a large portion of the L4D code, and created a mod which is currently in its play-testing stages, expected for a release in 5 months time. It has no entry on moddb, and only has an almost-empty wikia and not even a single screenshot.

…Too soon to call it BM’s chief rival for Mod of the Year 2010?

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead mod coming 2010
item.dc:creator: Chaoswolf75
item.description:
The Minotaur:

How the hell do you know that DAY that its going to come out?

Because its the date my late brother set for its release. The mod requires a lot of work, so much that we need to set a release date in 2010.

Also, that isnt Jack Black in the photo, but it is me! And the guy to the right is my dead brother.

Read full topic

item.description:
Chaoswolf75:

Oh, Shadow, what have you done?

Anyway, i’m the main developer of this mod.

Simply put, its built using a custom modding tool, “WolfMod” as my brother so put it. “2010” is unspecific, its out may 27th 2010. Also, the team consists of 12 people, not 3. We know what we’re doing…

How the hell do you know that DAY that its going to come out?

item.title: Left 4 Dead mod coming 2010
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Mr.Shadow:

Hi. I found an upcoming left 4 dead mod a while ago and I started helping the creators out by posting my ideas and such and I thought I should share the mod with you people.
Here’s the link: https://left4dead11ty.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page

As far as I know there’s no moddb page and such but this will serve enough.
It’s a standalone mod meaning you can get it without having Left 4 Dead.

Well,look around in the site and such and post your opinions about the mod down below and I’ll read them.

  1. Only inexperienced and naive modders announce a mod at a pre-concept stage. 99% of mods announced so early fail within weeks.

  2. It’s totally ridiculous to start making a L4D mod when L4D2 is about to come out, everyone and their mother is going to be playing L4D2 instead from next month onwards.

  3. Stupid name for a mod.

  4. I have never seen such a poorly assembled wiki spammed with adverts and a terrible colour scheme in my entire fucking life. It’s based off a perfectly functioning template and yet the horrible customization still manages to piss all over my eyes.

  5. Clearly there’s no moddb page because you’re afraid of being laughed at by all the real modders. I defy you to actually make one and start posting all your media if this isn’t the case.

  6. “Unlockable Weapons: Laser Rifle / Laser Launcher / Rail Driver / Mega Barrel Shotgun / .500 Magnum / Lightsaber”

  7. Well you say it’s just going to be a standalone source mod, but clearly the entire concept is based around L4D gameplay, features and code. I mean, you must not understand what’s going on or something…

What else can I say? You’ve got nothing, a mod concept and 2 weapons you’ve probably pulled off fpsbanana.

Read full topic
